title: This Case Is Built for Intel X599
description: The InWin 928 has a mission to provide an extreme case for Intel's upcoming X599 platform.  *Thanks to our sponsors for helping us get to CES 2019*  MSI Phanteks Corsair Razer Thermaltake  As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Main 4K Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second 4K Camera -  $700 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------
